text:
uTrade Solutions | Full Time | Onsite (Chandigarh, India) | www.utradesolutions.com

uTrade Solutions is trading products company based in Chandigarh, India. We build enterprise retail and algorithmic trading products.

We are looking for talented engineers to join our Retail and and Algo product teams. Our development stacks are on C++ and Python (Django).

Feel free to contact me directly (hss at utradesolutions dot com) for any questions.
